content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going pretty well. I'm just relaxing at home, listening to music and enjoying the low tide.
Sounds peaceful! I'm at the library, finishing up a paper for my women's studies class. I'm not doing so well in it, but I'm determined to pass.
What's your favorite thing about women's studies?
I love learning about the different ways women have been oppressed throughout history, and how we can work to change that.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll do great on your paper. What do you like to do for fun on the weekends?
I love to shop, go to the movies, and make art and crafts. What about you?
I love to relax at home with my dog, listen to music, and watch movies. I also enjoy going for walks in the park.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies!
Yeah, I try to keep busy. How about you?
I keep pretty busy too. I like to stay active and have fun.
That's great! I'm glad you have a lot of interests.
Thanks! I'm glad you do too
